thread.title: Baby Beaver Adorably Tips Over Every Time He Moves His Tail

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Baby Beaver Adorably Tips Over Every Time He Moves His Tail
text:
Baby Beaver Adorably Tips Over Every Time He Moves His Tail Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
This adorable baby beaver was found orphaned at a golf course in Calgary, Alberta and was rescued by the Alberta Institute of Wildlife Conservation. The little beaver was taken to their care facility where he enjoyed a dip in the water. The rescue group wrote, “Our current baby beaver patient enjoying pool time – adorable overload!” The little guy will remain in their care until he’s old enough to be released. 
The beaver hasn’t completely got control of his tail yet, and any time he looks at his belly it flips up and surprises him! His sweet antics brought a smile to my face! 
Please wait a few seconds for the video below to load.
